sampleDescriptions: HR 40 and S 40 address the creation of a commission to study and develop proposals for restitution for the descendants of enslaved African Americans. These bills focus on addressing the longstanding effects of slavery and systemic racism in the U.S., including racial wealth gaps, mass incarceration, and disparities in healthcare and education. Key lobbying efforts currently revolve around advancing these bills into law. State of Loc Nation Global Public Benefit Corporation has completed this research and introduced the legal framework to protect the majority from the tyranny of the minority. along with solutions for the surplus of the National deficit, mental illness repair of the community, et al

District Court case has presented clerk and judicial misconduct and intential delay. Supreme Court case initiated.
